bannerText.title: Holistic procurement outsourcing
text: It is advisable to involve a specialized organization when there is no contract service in the company, and the volume of procurements is large, or, on the contrary, procurements are rare and there is no need to organize your own procurement service.
In addition, during the procurement campaign, situations may arise that require more in-depth industry or methodological expertise.
In both cases, outsourcing work is an effective way to solve the problem in due time, as well as reducing the risk of complaints to the FAS, unscheduled inspections and fines.

cardset.title: The main areas of the services

cards.title: Development and examination of the Procurement Regulations
cards.description: Development of the Procurement Regulations considering your interests and needs. Analysis of the Procurement Regulations and development of recommendations for changes.

cards.title: Organization and conduct of procurement
cards.description: Full outsourcing (from documentation development to contract conclusion stage): recommendations on the choice of the procurement method, adjustment of the terms of reference, development of documentation, examination of the draft contract, posting information about the procurement on the ETP, in the UIS, participation in the meetings of procurement commissions.
